titleStmt.title: John McIntire, R. S Peters, and J. P. Barbour to Unknown
CWG7790

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Springfield Ky
Novr 6, 1862
Secretary of State --

A vacancy having occured in district No 2_in the Magistracy ^Washington County^ We the undersigned recommend Antony B Hundley as a suitable person to fill said vacancy; he is a sound Union man and well qualified to fill the same -- We have written to you heretofore but received no answer --

John McIntire Presiding Judge in & for Washington Co
R S Peters County Clerk
J P Barlow Court Clerk

Washington Co
J. P. Dist. 2.
Jno. McIntire
Comd Nov. 8. 1862
